summary:
- **Buy-Back Type:** On-market buy-back  
- **Maximum Shares to be Repurchased:** 10,457,680 (10% of issued capital)  
- **Buy-Back Period:** 21/7/2025 to 17/7/2026  
- **Broker Handling Buy-Back:** CMC Markets Stockbroking Limited  
- **Key Conditions:** No shareholder approval required; company may suspend/terminate buy-back at any time.
